record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - July 30, 2007)

[Page: H8899]

speaking-unknown-id.title: Ms.
speaking-unknown-id.name: SANDLIN, HERSETH
speaking-unknown-id.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members may have 5 legislative days within which to revise and extend their remarks on the bill just adopted.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from South Dakota?
